name: Space Evolution
description:
Game of rockets and spaceships

contains some rockets and ships that can be unlocked according to your level

various types of enemies many maps but some locked for future updates as well as history mode

offline game

the download file is in rar format for 32bit and 64bit

game on play store=https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.gametecstudio.spaceevolution
